• The BCCI on Tuesday announced the 15-member squad for the World Test Championship final
  • Virat Kohli will lead the side and has Ajinkya Rahane as his deputy

articles.author: ESPNcricinfo staff
articles.title: Women's T20s at 2022 Birmingham Commonwealth Games to run from July 29 to August 7 - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: The matches will be played at Edgbaston over a ten-day period
articles.content: NewsThe matches will be played at Edgbaston over a ten-day period
